verses.verse: אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מַסְעֵ֣י <S%H4550><s%> These [are] the journeys בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יָצְא֛וּ <S%H3318><s%> which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> with their armies בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> under the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> wrote מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹצָאֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H4161><s%> their goings out לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4550><s%> according to their journeys עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these מַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4550><s%> and these [are] their journeys לְמוֹצָאֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4161><s%> according to their goings out

וַיִּסְע֤וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵֽרַעְמְסֵס֙ <S%H7486><s%> from Rameses בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> in the first בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> of the first מִֽמָּחֳרַ֣ת <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow הַפֶּ֗סַח <S%H6453><s%> after the passover יָצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand רָמָ֔ה <S%H7311><s%> with an high לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian

וּמִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian מְקַבְּרִ֗ים <S%H6912><s%> buried אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִכָּ֧ה <S%H5221><s%> had smitten יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בָּהֶ֖ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכ֑וֹר <S%H1060><s%> all [their] firstborn וּבֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> among them upon their gods עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> executed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> also the LORD שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <S%H8201><s%> judgments

וַיִּסְע֥וּ <S%H5265><s%> removed בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵרַעְמְסֵ֑ס <S%H7486><s%> from Rameses וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּסֻכֹּֽת׃ <S%H5523><s%> in Succoth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִסֻּכֹּ֑ת <S%H5523><s%> from Succoth וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְאֵתָ֔ם <S%H864><s%> in Etham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> which [is] in the edge הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מֵֽאֵתָ֔ם <S%H864><s%> from Etham וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> and turned again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּ֣י הַחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> unto Pihahiroth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בַּ֣עַל צְפ֑וֹן <S%H1189><s%> which [is] before Baalzephon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and they pitched לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מִגְדֹּֽל׃ <S%H4024><s%> Migdol

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> Pihahiroth וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> and passed through בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> the midst הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea הַמִּדְבָּ֑רָה <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> went דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days' בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness אֵתָ֔ם <S%H864><s%> of Etham וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּמָרָֽה׃ <S%H4785><s%> in Marah

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִמָּרָ֔ה <S%H4785><s%> from Marah וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֵילִ֑מָה <S%H362><s%> unto Elim וּ֠בְאֵילִם <S%H362><s%> and in Elim שְׁתֵּ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֞ה <S%H6240><s%> ten עֵינֹ֥ת <S%H5869><s%> fountains מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> and threescore and ten תְּמָרִ֖ים <S%H8558><s%> palm trees וַיַּחֲנוּ־ <S%H2583><s%> and they pitched שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מֵאֵילִ֑ם <S%H362><s%> from Elim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> by the Red

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִיַּם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֑וּף <S%H5488><s%> from the Red וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִֽין׃ <S%H5512><s%> of Sin

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they took their journey מִמִּדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> out of the wilderness סִ֑ין <S%H5512><s%> of Sin וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּדָפְקָֽה׃ <S%H1850><s%> in Dophkah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִדָּפְקָ֑ה <S%H1850><s%> from Dophkah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּאָלֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H442><s%> in Alush

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מֵאָל֑וּשׁ <S%H442><s%> from Alush וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בִּרְפִידִ֔ם <S%H7508><s%> at Rephidim וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֨יָה <S%H1961><s%> had שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> now it was there מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> where was no water לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> to drink
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵרְפִידִ֑ם <S%H7508><s%> from Rephidim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> from the desert סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּקִבְרֹ֥ת הַֽתַּאֲוָֽה׃ <S%H6914><s%> at Kibrothhattaavah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִקִּבְרֹ֣ת הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <S%H6914><s%> from Kibrothhattaavah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בַּחֲצֵרֹֽת׃ <S%H2698><s%> at Hazeroth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵחֲצֵרֹ֑ת <S%H2698><s%> from Hazeroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּרִתְמָֽה׃ <S%H7575><s%> in Rithmah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵרִתְמָ֑ה <S%H7575><s%> from Rithmah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּרִמֹּ֥ן פָּֽרֶץ׃ <S%H7428><s%> at Rimmonparez
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵרִמֹּ֣ן פָּ֑רֶץ <S%H7428><s%> from Rimmonparez וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּלִבְנָֽה׃ <S%H3841><s%> in Libnah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִלִּבְנָ֑ה <S%H3841><s%> from Libnah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּרִסָּֽה׃ <S%H7446><s%> at Rissah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they journeyed מֵרִסָּ֑ה <S%H7446><s%> from Rissah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בִּקְהֵלָֽתָה׃ <S%H6954><s%> in Kehelathah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they went מִקְּהֵלָ֑תָה <S%H6954><s%> from Kehelathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> in mount שָֽׁפֶר׃ <S%H8234><s%> Shapher
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מֵֽהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> from mount שָׁ֑פֶר <S%H8234><s%> Shapher וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בַּחֲרָדָֽה׃ <S%H2732><s%> in Haradah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מֵחֲרָדָ֑ה <S%H2732><s%> from Haradah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּמַקְהֵלֹֽת׃ <S%H4722><s%> in Makheloth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִמַּקְהֵלֹ֑ת <S%H4722><s%> from Makheloth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּתָֽחַת׃ <S%H8480><s%> at Tahath
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִתָּ֑חַת <S%H8480><s%> from Tahath וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּתָֽרַח׃ <S%H8646><s%> at Tarah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִתָּ֑רַח <S%H8646><s%> from Tarah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּמִתְקָֽה׃ <S%H4989><s%> in Mithcah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they went מִמִּתְקָ֑ה <S%H4989><s%> from Mithcah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּחַשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H2832><s%> in Hashmonah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵֽחַשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <S%H2832><s%> from Hashmonah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּמֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H4149><s%> at Moseroth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִמֹּסֵר֑וֹת <S%H4149><s%> from Moseroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בִּבְנֵ֥י יַעֲקָֽן׃ <S%H1142><s%> in Benejaakan
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִבְּנֵ֣י יַעֲקָ֑ן <S%H1142><s%> from Benejaakan וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּחֹ֥ר הַגִּדְגָּֽד׃ <S%H2735><s%> at Horhagidgad
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they went מֵחֹ֣ר הַגִּדְגָּ֑ד <S%H2735><s%> from Horhagidgad וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּיָטְבָֽתָה׃ <S%H3193><s%> in Jotbathah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִיָּטְבָ֑תָה <S%H3193><s%> from Jotbathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּעַבְרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H5684><s%> at Ebronah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵֽעַבְרֹנָ֑ה <S%H5684><s%> from Ebronah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּעֶצְי֥וֹן גָּֽבֶר׃ <S%H6100><s%> at Eziongaber

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מֵעֶצְי֣וֹן גָּ֑בֶר <S%H6100><s%> from Eziongaber וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness צִ֖ן <S%H6790><s%> of Zin הִ֥וא <S%H1931><s%> that קָדֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H6946><s%> which [is] Kadesh

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִקָּדֵ֑שׁ <S%H6946><s%> from Kadesh וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּהֹ֣ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount בִּקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> in the edge אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> of Edom

וַיַּעַל֩ <S%H5927><s%> went up אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֹ֥ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> into mount עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> and died שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year הָֽאַרְבָּעִ֗ים <S%H705><s%> there in the fortieth לְצֵ֤את <S%H3318><s%> were come out בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> after the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֖י <S%H2549><s%> [day] of the fifth בְּאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> in the first לַחֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H2320><s%> month

וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁלֹ֧שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> [was] an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּמֹת֖וֹ <S%H4194><s%> when he died בְּהֹ֥ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> in mount ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> heard הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanite מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king עֲרָ֔ד <S%H6166><s%> Arad וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> who יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בַּנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> in the south בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בְּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> of the coming בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵהֹ֣ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> from mount וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּצַלְמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H6758><s%> in Zalmonah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִצַּלְמֹנָ֑ה <S%H6758><s%> from Zalmonah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּפוּנֹֽן׃ <S%H6325><s%> in Punon
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מִפּוּנֹ֑ן <S%H6325><s%> from Punon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּאֹבֹֽת׃ <S%H88><s%> in Oboth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵאֹבֹ֑ת <S%H88><s%> from Oboth וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּעִיֵּ֥י הָעֲבָרִ֖ים <S%H5863><s%> in Ijeabarim בִּגְב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> in the border מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵעִיִּ֑ים <S%H5864><s%> from Iim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּדִיבֹ֥ן <S%H1769><s%> in Dibongad גָּֽד׃ <S%H1410><s%> Gad

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מִדִּיבֹ֣ן <S%H1769><s%> from Dibongad גָּ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְּעַלְמֹ֥ן דִּבְלָתָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H5963><s%> in Almondiblathaim

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they removed מֵעַלְמֹ֣ן דִּבְלָתָ֑יְמָה <S%H5963><s%> from Almondiblathaim וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּהָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains הָעֲבָרִ֖ים <S%H5682><s%> of Abarim לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before נְבֽוֹ׃ <S%H5015><s%> Nebo

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they departed מֵהָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> from the mountains הָעֲבָרִ֑ים <S%H5682><s%> of Abarim וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> [near] Jericho

וַיַּחֲנ֤וּ <S%H2583><s%> And they pitched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan מִבֵּ֣ית הַיְשִׁמֹ֔ת <S%H1020><s%> from Bethjesimoth עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far אָבֵ֣ל הַשִּׁטִּ֑ים <S%H63><s%> [even] unto Abelshittim בְּעַֽרְבֹ֖ת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> When אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> unto them When ye are passed over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וְה֨וֹרַשְׁתֶּ֜ם <S%H3423><s%> Then ye shall drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> all the inhabitants הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> from before וְאִ֨בַּדְתֶּ֔ם <S%H6><s%> you and destroy אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַשְׂכִּיֹּתָ֑ם <S%H4906><s%> all their pictures וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צַלְמֵ֤י <S%H6754><s%> images מַסֵּֽכֹתָם֙ <S%H4541><s%> all their molten תְּאַבֵּ֔דוּ <S%H6><s%> and destroy וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּמֹתָ֖ם <S%H1116><s%> all their high places תַּשְׁמִֽידוּ׃ <S%H8045><s%> and quite pluck down

וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֥ם <S%H3423><s%> And ye shall dispossess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [the inhabitants] of the land וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <S%H3427><s%> and dwell בָּ֑הּ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לָכֶ֛ם נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> therein for I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you the land לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְהִתְנַחַלְתֶּם֩ <S%H5157><s%> for an inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בְּגוֹרָ֜ל <S%H1486><s%> by lot לְמִשְׁפְּחֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H4940><s%> among your families לָרַ֞ב <S%H7227><s%> [and] to the more תַּרְבּ֤וּ <S%H7235><s%> ye shall give the more אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5159><s%> inheritance וְלַמְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> and to the fewer תַּמְעִ֣יט <S%H4591><s%> ye shall give the less אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> inheritance אֶל֩ <S%H413><s%> about אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יֵ֨צֵא <S%H3318><s%> falleth ל֥וֹ שָׁ֛מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> every man's [inheritance] shall be in the place where his lot ל֣וֹ יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְמַטּ֥וֹת <S%H4294><s%> according to the tribes אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers תִּתְנֶחָֽלוּ׃ <S%H5157><s%> ye shall inherit

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not תוֹרִ֜ישׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> But if ye will not drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶם֒ <S%H6440><s%> from before וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall come אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom תּוֹתִ֣ירוּ <S%H3498><s%> you then it shall come to pass that those which ye let remain מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> of them as לְשִׂכִּים֙ <S%H7899><s%> of them [shall be] pricks בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> in your eyes וְלִצְנִינִ֖ם <S%H6796><s%> and thorns בְּצִדֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H6654><s%> in your sides וְצָרֲר֣וּ <S%H6887><s%> and shall vex אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> wherein ye dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and דִּמִּ֛יתִי <S%H1819><s%> unto you as I thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> Moreover it shall come to pass [that] I shall do לָהֶ֖ם אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> to do לָכֶֽם׃ פ
